Value.label: Orientation
Value.Help: Controls the on/off orientation of the rocker switch

Value.label: LED Indicator Control
Value.Help: Choose if you want the LED indicator to turn on when switch is on or off

Item.label: LED on when switch is off
LED on when switch is on

Value.label: Enable/Disable LED Indicator
Value.Help: Enable or disable LED indicator so it stays off at all times

Value.label: Ramp Rate Control
Value.Help: Choose how fast you want to turn the light on and off
